entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 3:00 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: -5.0°C
Wind: E 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
